messages.name: Board Member 1
messages.phrase: With the ... removal of Alvis Hughes, the direction of this company has taken a favorable turn. We are making good time.

messages.name: Board Member 2
messages.phrase: Yes, if we keep going at this rate, we might just make a puff of smoke and a ball of yarn.

messages.name: Board Member 2
messages.phrase: Your plans have yet again underwhelmed me, friend. This new CEO is hardly what we need.

messages.name: Board Member 2
messages.phrase: He is too unpredictable - his own desires fo not coincide with our own.

messages.name: Board Member 2
messages.phrase: I say we oust this fickle-minded fool and find another one.

messages.name: Board Member 3
messages.phrase: Alvis was too much of an idealist, and that's why he was a liability.

messages.name: Board Member 3
messages.phrase: It is true that this new CEO, Victor Morana, may not agree with out methods, but he is greedy.

messages.name: Board Member 3
messages.phrase: That makes him easy to control.

messages.name: Board Member 3
messages.phrase: Ophel Industries is the best way for us to achieve our goals.

messages.name: Board Member 3
messages.phrase: Mr. Morana is currently our greatest asset, but he doesn't have to be our ally. Now let us adjourn.

messages.name: Victor
messages.phrase: I don't remember what he said
